title: HoP 397 - Do As the Romans Did - French Humanism
itunes:title: HoP 397 - Do As the Romans Did - French Humanism
description: We begin to look at philosophy in Renaissance France, beginning with humanists like Budé and the use of classical philosophy by poets du Bellay and Ronsard.
content:encoded: We begin to look at philosophy in Renaissance France, beginning with humanists like Budé and the use of classical philosophy by poets du Bellay and Ronsard.
